content: easy as air cowl by corrine lung designs this cowl is my treat to you this season perfect for beginners and quick to knit it s designed with holiday gifting in mind all you need is a single skein of aran-weight yarn with a soft lace pattern that s simple to memorize this cowl knits up fast and brings a cozy warm touch to any outfit whether you re making one for yourself or a loved one it s a feel-good project that s free for everyone this season ✨ grab your yarn and join me in making something special ✨ #easyasaircowl#holidayknitgifts#freeknitpattern #corrinelungdesigns ravelry lungc instagram @corrinelungdesigns facebook corrine lung designs email corrinelungdesigns@gmail com easy as air cowl 1 ©corrine lung 2024 by corrine lung designs 2024 pattern for personal use only pattern level beginner abbreviations yarn aran-weight yarn approximately 34 37 40 g 128 141 154 yds 118 130 142 m bor beginning of round other aran-weight yarns are suitable as long as you eor end of round meet gauge k knit k2tog knit 2 together decreases 1 stitch gauge 17 sts x 24 row = 4 in stockinette needles 5 0mm us 8 40cm/16 circulars or size k2tog tbl knit 2 together through the needed to meet gauge appropriate for your back loop decreases 1 st yarn m marker p purl size adult small medium large pm place marker s finished measurements 9 0 /23cm tall x 19 21 23 / 48 53 59 cm around rm remove marker s round round notions stitch markers including one unique row sm slip marker counter tape measure tapestry needle st s stitch es scissors and optional blocking tools tbl through the back loop sample knit using beroccomochi aran-weight yarn yo yarn over 37% baby alpaca 35% nylon 26% fine merino wool 2% other fiber in colorway garnet #3247 1 skein i ve also knit this in garnstudio drops air and found it a very suitable alternative actual yardage may vary based on your gauge and yarn instructions place extra markers as needed to keep track of pattern stitches each pattern repeat is approximately 1 25 /3 5cm in length cast on using your favorite stretchy cast-on method cast on 80 88 96 stitches join for working in the round being careful not to twist use yarn tail or a unique marker to visually mark the bor start garter edging round 1 k8 pm repeat to eor round 2 purl round slipping markers as you go round 3-6 repeat rnds 1 & 2 two more times round 7 knit ©corrine lung 2024 pattern for personal use only easy as air cowl 2 by corrine lung 2024 easy as air cowl pattern pattern repeat 8 stitches & 4 row main lace pattern circumference start working the chart or written instruction for 10 11 12 pattern repeats around meaning one chart between each of the markers 10/11/12 x 8 = 80/88/96 sts length work through pattern approximately 11 times or until desired length
